Process Probe View

Requires: NI Distributed System Manager (Windows)

Right-click a process and select Probe from the shortcut menu to display this view. This view shows the status of the selected process and allows you to start or stop that process.

This view includes the following components:

  • Location—Displays the location of the selected process.
  • State—Displays whether the process is online or offline, or displays if you do not have sufficient access privileges to modify the state.
  • Start Process—Starts the selected process. You must have sufficient access privileges to start a process.
  • Stop Process—Stops the selected process. You must have sufficient access privileges to stop a process.
